ygData.subject: RE: Infected Paw
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmmmm... I wonder what level range Paineel and the Hole are going to be targetted for.  I have been to Erudin once in my whole career (to buys songs).
ygData.messageBody:
Hmmmm... I wonder what level range "Paineel" and "the Hole" are going to be
targetted for. I have been to Erudin once in my whole career (to buys
songs). When I was there, I never saw another single person. As it stands,
that island doesn't have a whole heckuva lot to offer.

Concerning Feign Death... You know Verant never thought that it would become
one of the best "pulling" methods around. It sucks they had to nerf it, but
I can understand where they're coming from.

Desmei Sightblinder
Lvl 32 Bard [Povar]

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:Dean_Kimes@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, November 16, 1999 1:27 PM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Infected Paw
>
>
> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
> He should be as safe as ever in Q Hills. I travel thru there
> regularly and
> was there last nite as well, no sign of unusual mobs. Unlike
> Kithicor Q
> Hills appears to have been a singular event. What concerns
> me more is the
> change to Paw and the trend you mentioned. While its great
> for high level
> characters, what are the people who aren't high level
> supposed to do? My
> guild has a whole group of six on its way to Paw now as its
> one of the few
> uncrowded places perfect for their levels. If they really
> want upgrade a
> zone how about Kerra Isle? It would be a month before word
> would even get
> out most likely.
>
> Kitasi

[snip]
